pages.text: 0 COZY, BOOZY, NEVER BOUGIE The Tin Roof has been Charleston's home away from home for local and touring musical acts for over 18 years. We also host trivia, parties, competitions, craft bazaars, private events, dance-offs, movie nights, video game nights, live karaoke, all sorts of local and touring comedy acts and so much more. Hell of a happy hour, too. See you soon! "Best live music dive in West Ashley . Great service, affordable drinks, intimate concert vibes with a wide variety of music and events!" Yelp • "Best live music dive in West Ashley . Great service, affordable drinks, intimate concert vibes with a wide variety of music and events!" Yelp • "Best live music dive in West Ashley . Great service, affordable drinks, intimate concert vibes with a wide variety of music and events!" Yelp • 1117 MAGNOLIA ROADCHARLESTON, SC 29407 SCROLL DOWN FOR MAP MON - FRI 4PM-12AMSAT & SUN 12PM-12AM LIVE EVENTS PARKING Our lot can be a little tricky. Please carpool when you can. Do not park on the side street by Tin Roof (Hobart Ave.) If parking in the neighborhood, please be respectful of our neighbors (don't litter and keep the noise down). You can park in the grassy area behind Seegar's Dental Center. COME ON BY! Stuck in rush hour traffic? Bored streaming whatever it is everyone is streaming? Sick of doom-scrolling??? Come have a seat, a laugh, a drink or a bite. Or all of it. We’re here for you!
